TopicTitle: "Show vessel labels" is disabled while in game

Articles.Content:
I noticed my "show vessel labels" got unticked while in game. I think it's after reverting or quickloading many times. Anyone else noticed this?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-12T00:15:31Z" title="08/12/2015 12:15  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 12, 2015</time> by martinborgen**

> 
> I noticed my "show vessel labels" got unticked while in game. I think it's after reverting or quickloading many times. Anyone else noticed this?

F4 toggles it, so you might've hit that by accident.
